bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with mu xie 目斜

a) . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry zhi 枳 quoting Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry zhi shi 枳實：卒中急風，身直，不得屈伸反覆者 , “When one has suddenly been struck by urgent wind, and [as a result] the body is straight, and one is unable to bend and stretch”, writes: 中風身直，不得屈伸反覆，及口僻眼斜 , “When one has been struck by wind, and [as a result] his body is straightened and he is unable to bend and stretch, and the mouth is wry and the eyes are awry ”.
